question: If I start with a certain plan can I upgrade?
ans: Absolutely! Any time, just go to the Organization settings tab (in the SaleAssist panel) and click on the upgrade button

question: Do you offer FREE trial?
ans: Yes, we do offer FREE trial. Please contact us and we will activate it for you.

question: In popular plan, How am I billed when I add new members to the account?
ans: There is no additional billing. You can add as many members as you can?

question: What if I have multiple websites?
ans: No problem, in all the plans there is no limit to how many websites you integrate

question: How many widgets, buttons, QR code etc i can generate?
ans: You can create as many widgets, buttons or QR code in all the plans

question: Is there any limit to number of conversations, or duration of conversations?
ans: No there is no limit to number of conversations or duration of conversations in any of the plan. The total usage is calculated at month end and invoice raised accordingly

question: What happens if I cancel?
ans: You may cancel your subscription any time by going to the SaleAssist dashboard  Organization settings and cancel

question: Do you offer Video Sales people as well?
ans: Yes. If you have demand of Video Sales people, we provide video sales people to you.

question: In standard plan, how many members can use the platform?
ans: You can have upto 2 members use the platform in Standard plan.

question: Do you do custom development work?
ans: Yes. We have an open API and a Professional Services Team that loves to create custom solutions. Contact our team to learn more.
